<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Burning Mammoth Reaver](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1768)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 54</row>

**Perception** +8

**Languages**
[Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Reaver's Howl** When the reaver attempts an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53), the reaver compares the result of the Intimidation check to the Will DC of each non–Burning Mammoth creature within 30 feet, determining the effect separately for each creature. The reaver's howl ignores the usual circumstance penalty to the Intimidation check for not speaking the same language as the target.

**Items**
[Battle Axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16), [Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6), [javelins](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (3), [lesser tallow bombs](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1501) (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 30

**Spurred by Death** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** An ally within 30 feet reduces a creature to 0 HP; **Effect** The reaver Steps or Strides.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
battle axe +11 ([Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 slashing plus cut down

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +9 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tallow bomb +9 ([Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and 1 fire splash

**Cut Down**   When a reaver hits a creature with a battle axe Strike, the target must succeed at a DC 16 Fortitude save or fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). If the creature critically fails its save, it takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage as it falls prone.

</column>
name: Burning Mammoth Reaver
